headline: Here’s What Lifted Pentair plc (PNR) in Q3
summary: Impax Asset Management, an investment management company, released its “Impax Global Environmental Markets Fund” third quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The MSCI All Country World Index (MSCI ACWI), which measures global equities, saw gains throughout the quarter as monetary easing by the US and Chinese central banks […]
